${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:CarbideHandBonesRelic.NAME: Carbide Hand Bones
${modID}:CarbideHandBonesRelic.FLAVOR: Blue carbide merely dents where weak collagen would be smashed to bits.

${modID}:ForceModulatorRelic.NAME: Force Modulator
${modID}:ForceModulatorRelic.FLAVOR: The emitted frequencies of your tiniest bits are synchronized with the standardized band for force emission.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Your first attack each turn deals damage regardless of the enemy's block.

${modID}:InflatableAxonsRelic.NAME: Inflatable Axons
${modID}:InflatableAxonsRelic.FLAVOR: Nanoscopic stents inflate the gossamer brain-threads that restrict the conduction of the will.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. On odd turns, draw 2 additional cards. On even turns, draw 1 less card.

${modID}:StabilizerArmLocksRelic.NAME: Stabilizer Arm Locks
${modID}:StabilizerArmLocksRelic.FLAVOR: Chrome clasps fasten arm joints to emulate the stillness of unlife.

${modID}:CathedraWithRubyTraceryRelic.NAME: Cathedra w/Ruby Tracery
${modID}:CathedraWithRubyTraceryRelic.FLAVOR: Wavecrests of slag interrupt the plane geometry of the gigantic seat. The splats and claw feet are burned and disarranged; the ritual of transformation never ends.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of your turn, gain
. At the start of combat, shuffle a #yPyrokinesis #yField into your draw pile.

${modID}:GiantHandsRelic.NAME: Giant Hands
${modID}:GiantHandsRelic.FLAVOR: For ages they dreamed, 'the hands must grow'. In the soft luster of a laboratory, the dream was realized.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random attack in your hand by 1.

${modID}:HolographicVisageRelic.NAME: Holographic Visage
${modID}:HolographicVisageRelic.FLAVOR: Emulsion slicks on the cheek and laser light evokes pareidolic warmth.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Each combat, the first 2 times you end your turn without playing any attacks, gain 1 Buffer.

${modID}:HyperElasticAnkleTendonsRelic.NAME: Hyper-Elastic Ankle Tendons
${modID}:HyperElasticAnkleTendonsRelic.FLAVOR: Banded ropes of hydrogel are bundled into one.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Your #ySprints draw 1 additional card and don't #yExhaust.

${modID}:MedassistModuleRelic.NAME: Medassist Module
${modID}:MedassistModuleRelic.FLAVOR: Pneumatic applicators are hardwired to an intelligent control unit that dictates the injection of protean dyes into the veins.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Your first played #yInjector card each turn costs 0.

${modID}:MotorizedTreadsRelic.NAME: Motorized Treads
${modID}:MotorizedTreadsRelic.FLAVOR: Triangular treads swathe the teeth of giant gears that turn to locomote. Their human has escaped the confines of bipedal motion.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Draw 2 additional cards at the start of each turn. You cannot draw additional cards after.

${modID}:PrecisionForceLatheRelic.NAME: Precision Force Lathe
${modID}:PrecisionForceLatheRelic.FLAVOR: A magnetically-shielded headstock holds space in kinetic suspension while a force spindle spins and sharpens it to a point.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of your turn, add a #yForce #yKnife+ to your hand.
